summary: Mertra is a Nord archer available in CBBE, UNP, and SeveNBase.  HDT options available as well as base body types.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Verdana][b][color=#1e84cc][size=6]Mertra[/size][/color][/b]


[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/hqr1crp1j/20170114220012_1.jpg[/img]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/q8kmqqt53/Info.png[/img]
Name:  Mertra
Race:  Custom Nord
Voice:  Female Sultry
Marriageable:  Yes
Height:  1.00
Weight:  80
Body Options:  CBBE (Custom & Base), UNP (Base & HDT), SeveNBase (Base & HDT)
Skin:  Demoniac (2k & 4K)
Armor:  Sucker Punch Sweet Pea (HDT Body Options Only)
Weapons:  Ebony Bow & Arrow, Dagger
Spells:  Disarm Shout & Healing Related
Location:  Angi's Camp

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/3qozkmnbb/6039216_f520.jpg[/img]

Class:  Combat Ranger
Style:  Missile

Levels with player.  Nord traits/bonuses
Skills/Bonuses:  Archery, Sneak, Restoration, Light Armor

Tested with EFF & AFT
ENBs Pictured:  Vividian & RealVision

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/vpj5bhoxz/20170119103818_1.jpg[/img]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/czbb4dts7/Requirements.png[/img]
[u][b]All Versions[/b][/u]

Dawnguard
Dragonborn

[b][u]Armor/HDT Versions[/u][/b]

HDT Compatible Skeleton
HDT Physics
HDT High Heel

[b][u]Base SeveNBase Version[/u][/b]

BBP/TBBP Compatible Skeleton 

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/3q94u9kw7/Recommended.png[/img]
Modified Skeleton such as XPMSE[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]
Facelight[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76051/?]Are You There[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75951/?]Fix Lip Sync

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/iidullqtj/Known_Issues.png[/img]
[/url]Some ENBs may show slight skin discoloration between body and head

Armor may clip during some poses/animations

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/5fy2sp30n/20170116124007_1.jpg[/img]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/10858658/?]sfeile
[/url][url=https://www.facebook.com/groups/218944591881610/]Skyrim Mods & Modders[/url]
[url=https://www.facebook.com/groups/1273841859340346/]Children of Akatosh[/url]
[url=https://www.facebook.com/groups/bethesdamods/]Bethesda Mod Creation Collective[/url]
[url=https://www.facebook.com/groups/SkyrimModsFollowerHoarders/]Skyrim Mods Follower Hoarders

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/8r3pgoykn/Q&A.png[/img]
[/url]Q:  Why do you make so many followers?
A:  I'm a follower hoarder/addict; since there is no Followers Anon I only have Nexus.

Q:  Will you release the Racemenu preset?
A:  My apologies, I no longer release my personal presets.

Q:  What are the other armors shown in screenshots?
A:  UNP Ranger, DevilMaid by Neo, Forbidden Ebony Armor

Q:  Her armor is skimpy & not lore friendly
A:  I never claimed it was lore friendly and frankly I just like the armor
A:  If you don't like the armor please feel free to download the no armor versions

Q:  Do you take requests, suggestions, complaints?
A:  I'm open to all requests, suggestions, and feedback as long as they are polite.
